method.name: clone()
method.description: Creates and returns a copy of this object.

method.name: equals(Object obj)
method.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one.

method.name: finalize()
method.description: Called by the garbage collector on an object when garbage collection determines that there are no more references to the object.

method.name: getClass()
method.description: Returns the runtime class of this Object.

method.name: hashCode()
method.description: Returns a hash code value for the object.

method.name: notify()
method.description: Wakes up a single thread that is waiting on this object's monitor.

method.name: notifyAll()
method.description: Wakes up all threads that are waiting on this object's monitor.

method.name: toString()
method.description: Returns a string representation of the object.

method.name: wait(long millis, int nanos)
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object, or some other thread interrupts the current thread, or a certain amount of real time has elapsed.

method.name: wait(long millis)
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until either another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object, or a specified amount of time has elapsed.

method.name: wait()
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object.

method.name: getTag()
method.description: Returns the tag for this tab specification.

method.name: setContent(Intent intent)
method.description: Specify an intent to use to launch an activity as the tab content.

method.name: setContent(TabHost.TabContentFactory contentFactory)
method.description: Specify a TabHost.TabContentFactory to use to create the content of the tab.

method.name: setContent(int viewId)
method.description: Specify the id of the view that should be used as the content of the tab.

method.name: setIndicator(View view)
method.description: Specify a view as the tab indicator.

method.name: setIndicator(CharSequence label)
method.description: Specify a label as the tab indicator.

method.name: setIndicator(CharSequence label, Drawable icon)
method.description: Specify a label and icon as the tab indicator.

api.name: getTag
api.description: Returns the tag for this tab specification.

parameter.name: String
parameter.description: the tag for this tab specification This value will never be null.

api.name: setContent
api.description: Specify an intent to use to launch an activity as the tab content.

api.name: setContent
api.description: Specify a TabHost.TabContentFactory to use to create the content of the tab.

api.name: setContent
api.description: Specify the id of the view that should be used as the content of the tab.

api.name: setIndicator
api.description: Specify a view as the tab indicator.

api.name: setIndicator
api.description: Specify a label as the tab indicator.

api.name: setIndicator
api.api_signature: public TabHost.TabSpec setIndicator (CharSequence label, Drawable icon)
api.description: Specify a label and icon as the tab indicator.
